juzs.text: Iqeob ed i medden uqeiii nnsen, u nitni stehzan, ur d rzin
Ur ten d ippas usmekti amaynut, s$uo Mass nnsen, mebla ma ppuraren, mara s sslen
Ur d rzin wulawen nnsen. Ppemcawaoen wid idensen, s tuffra: "d acu t wagi, siwa amdan am kunwi? Day a pvefoem sseur, kunwi tepwalim
Inna: "Mass iw Ieoa timenna deg igenni, di tmurt. Neppa Issel, Issen
Maca, nnan: "d taffa n tirga. Xaii! Isnulfa t id. Xaii! Neppa d amedyaz. Aha san, ad a$ d iawi assekni, akken id ippuceggaa i imezwura
Ur tumin, uqbel nnsen, yal temdint Nesqucc, day ad amnen nitni
Ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, siwa irgazen, iwumi Nweeea. Steqsit imawlan usmekti, ma ur teeoim
Ur ten Nerri d tifekkiwin ur ntepp lqut. Ur wekkoen
Sinna, Neiief deg wayen i sen Naahed, u Nsellek iten akked wid i £ ihwan. Nen$a imcumen
Ih, Nessers awen ed Tazmamt, degs asmekti nnwen. Day ur tefhimem ara
Aceal n temdinin idensen ay Neoea! Nexleq, deffir sent, agdud nniven
Mi eussen i lwaaoan nne£, atnan la regwlen, segs
Ur regwlet ara, u$alet ar wayen is testasrem, ar ixxamen nnwen. Amar fellawen asteqsi
Nnan: "a yamxix nne$, nella, s tidep, d imednas
Ur tfukk ti$oi yagi nnsen, armi ten Nerra d aqecqac urhif
Ur Nexliq ara, i wurar nne£, igenni, tamurt, akked wayen illan garasen
Lemmer day Neb$i lhawiyya, yili Nebbwi p id, s $uone£, maday Naana
Xaii! Nekkat tikerkas s tidep. Tneqq itent. Neqvent. A tawa$it nnwen, ilmend n wayen d teggarem
IneS kra illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Wid illan $uoeS, ur sme$woen ara iman nnsen, $ef uaabed iS. Ur aaggun
Ppanzen iv akked wass, ur seissifen
Ne$ ddmen d, si tmurt, ioebbiten id ipparan ar ddunit
Lemmer llin degsen ioebbiten, war Oebbi, war ccekk, ad fesden. Gedha s Oebbi, Mass n usgeld, seg wayen id ggaren
Ur fellaS asteqsi $ef wayen Ixeddem. Nitni, fellasen asteqsi
Ne$ day ddmen ioebbiten, war Neppa? Ini: "Awit ed atebbet nnwen". Ayagi d asmekti i wid illan yidi, d asmekti i wid illan, uqbel i. Maca, tegwti segsen, ur ssinen tidep. D$a zzin akin
Ur d Nuzen amazan, uqbel ik, siwa ma Nweeea yas ar: "ur illi oebbi siwa Nek, ihi aabdet iyI
Nnan: "Isaa Uenin aqcic". Gedha s yiS! Xaii! D imdanen imaazuzen
Ur S d zeggwiren deg wawal, xedmen s lameo iS
Ieoa i illan zdat sen, akked wayen illan deffir sen. Ur ccafaan, siwa $ef win Iouva. U nitni, si lxuf iS, peadaren
Win, segsen, id innan: "nek d oebbi, war Neppa", a t Nqeiii s Loahennama. Akka ay Nepqeiii imednas
Ne$ wid ijehlen ur walan ara tamurt akked igenwan llan mlalen? Nessemfaoaq iten, Nga s waman kra n wayen idren. Ihi, day ur ppamnen ara
Nerra di tmurt idurar, iwakken ur tepeerrik ara yissen. Nerra, degsen, tiza d iberdan, amar ad pwanhun
Nerra igenni d ssqef innestaoen, u nitni ooan issekniyen nne£
D Neppa i Ixelqen iv akked wass, iiij akked waggur, yal wa iteddu deg ubrid is
Ur Nefka ara, uqbel ik, tameddurt n lebda i umdan. Day kecc a ppemmtev, nitni ad wekkoen
Yal amdan ad ijeooeb tameppant. Nepjeooib ikwen s cceoo, akked lxio. D ahewwel. £uone£ tu$alin nnwen
Mara k id walin wid ijehlen, pmmaaliken kan fellak: "d wagi id ikkaten deg ioebbiten nnwen"? Nitni nekoen asmekti n Uenin
Ipwaxleq umdan si leemeq. Ad awen d Ssenaate$ issekniyen iW, ihi, ur iyI $eubet
Qqaren: "melmi lemaahda yagi, ma tessawalem tidep
Wid ijehlen, a lemmer ad eoen tagwnip ideg ur d tekksen udmawen nnsen, ne$ iarar nnsen, si tmes! Nitni ur pwasellken
Xaii! A ten id ias, deqzalla, a ten iwwet ba$a, ur zmiren a t rren, ne$ ad gganin
Ni$ ttahan $ef imazanen, uqbel ik! Ayen i$ef mmaalken, izzi d $ef wid, segsen, i ittahan
Ini: "anwa ara kwen ifukken, iv akked wass, seg Uenin"? Maca, ooan asmekti n Mass nnsen
Ne$ saan ioebbiten ara ten ifukken, war Nekwni? Ur zmiren ad sellken iman nnsen, ur sain imaiwnen mgal a£
Xaii! Nestaser i wigi akked imezwura nnsen, ar tewser nnsen. Day ur walan ara, Neppas ed ar tmurt, Nessenqas si leryaf is? Day d Nitni ara irebeen
Ini: "la kwen nedoe$ kan, s uweeei". Ur sellen iaeeugen i unabi ma ppunedoen
Ma ieuza ten uuuvu uaaqeb n Mass ik, war ccekk, a d inin: "a ssexv nne$! Ih, nella d imednas
A n Nessers lmizanat iuewben, ass n tnekra. Ur ipwadnes umdan s wacemma. Xas d aaqqa ucceryad, a t id Nawi. Nesteqnaa yisne£ i uqeiii
Ni$ Nefka i Musa akked Haoun, afraz, akked tafat d usmekti, i wid ipeezziben
Wid ippagwaden Mass nnsen, ur T walan, u pearaben $ef yimir
Wagi d asmekti ioqan, id Nessader. Day a t tagwim kunwi
Ni$ Nefka, zik, nnhaya s i Iboahim? Nella Nessen it
Mi inna i baba s akked ugdud is: "d acu tent taancurin agi, i la tepkabarem
Nnan d: "Nufa d imezwura nne$ la tent aabden
Inna: "ihi, tellam, kunwi akked imezwura nnwen, di ttelfan n uuee
Nnan: "tusiv a$ d, s tidep, ne$ kecc seg wid ippuraren
Inna: "xaii. Mass nnwen d Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, id Ixleq. Nek, seg inagan n waya
S Oebbi, ard ad andi$ i taancuoin nnwen, mara teiiixxoem
Isseftutes itent, siwa tameqwoant degsent, amar a d u$alen $uoes
Nnan: "anwa i igan akka i ioebbiten nne$? Neppa, war ccekk, d amednus
Nnan: "nesla i ilemei, itent id iudren, isem is Iboahim
Nnan: "awit ep id, zdat wallen n medden, amar ad ilin d inagan
Nnan: "day d kecc i igan akka, i ioebbiten nne$, a Iboahim
Inna: "xaii, i igan akka, d ameqwoan nnsen agi. Steqsit pen, ma pmeslayen
Endekwalen d. Nnan: "ih, d kunwi ay d imednas
Sinna, bran i iqweooa nnsen: "ni$ wigi, teeoiv, ur pmeslayen ara
Inna: "day taabdem, war Oebbi, ayen ur kwen inefaan, ur kwen iiiuooun, s wacemma
Tfuh i kunwi, akked wayen taabdem, war Oebbi! Day ur tefhimem ara
Nnan: "sseo$et ep, u sellket ioebbiten nnwen, ma taazmem
Nenna: "a times, ili d tasmuvi u d talwit, i Iboahim
Undin as p. Nerra ten d imexsuoen mavi
Nsellek it, akked Lui, ar tmurt i Neoqa i imavalen
Nefka yas Iseaq, Nerna yas Yaaqub. I sin, Nerra ten d wid imaanen
Nerra ten d imvebboen, nehhun s lameo nne£. Nweeea yasen igiten ilhan, taeallit, azekki. Llan d wid i £ iaabden
I Lut, Nefka uuwab, tamusni. Nsellek it si temdint i illan txeddem tucmitin. Llan, s tidep, d agdud n dir, d laaouo
Nesskecm it deg ueunu nne£. Neppa, ih, seg wid imaanen
I Nue, zik, mi inaao. Njaweb as ed. Nsellek it, neppa akked twacult is, si lefqaa abarar
Neneeeel it mgal agdud i iskaddben issekniyen nne£. Llan, s tidep, d agdud n dir. Ne$ves iten meooa
I Dawed akked Sliman, mi eudden $ef yiger, ideg ksant wulli n medden. Nella d Inagan ueuddu nnsen
Nessfehm as p i Sliman. I sin, Nefka uuwab, tamusni. Neeppem i idurar akked igvav ad sbuccaen Dawed. D ayen Newqem
Nesseefv as, ad awen iunaa iceiiiven, ara iearben fellawen si tiytiwin. Day a ppesnemmrem
I Sliman, avu n tarikt, ipuuvu s lameo is, $er tmurt i Neoqa. Nezga Neeo yal cci
Ger ccwaien, wa i$evves as, wa iqubel cce$l nniven. Nella d imearaben nnsen
I Yub, mi inuj $eo Mass is: "nek pwa$e$. Kecc, Tifev akw wid ipeunun
Njaweb as ed. Nekkes as it ivuooen; Nerra yas d tawacult is, akw, yides, tin i p icban. D aeunu s$uone£, d asmekti i iaabaden
Ismaail, Idris, Dulkifl, akken ma llan, d iueboiyen
Nesskecm iten deg ueunu nne£. Nitni, s tidep, seg wid imaanen
I Dannun, mi ioue s wurrif. I$il ur Nesai ara adabu fellas. Inaao, di tellis: "ur illi oebbi siwa Kecc. Gedha s yiseK! Nek lli$ si imednas
Njaweb as ed. Naateq it si eemik. Akka ay Naateq lmumnin
I Zakaria, mi inuj $uo Mass is: "a Mass iw! Ur iyi Ippaooa ara d amengur. Kecc, Tifev akw iweooaten
Njaweb as ed. Nefka yas Yaeia, Nesseela yas tameiiut is. Nitni, s tidep, izga izwar lxio nnsen. Pnujun $uone£, s tugwdi d usirem. Unzen a£
Ar tin i iqqimen zeddiget, Nuuv si ooue nne£. Nerra p, neppat akked mmi s, d assekni i imavalen
Lois agi nnwen, war ccek, d lois yiwen. Nek d Mass nnwen, ihi aabdet iyI
Gezmen lameo nnsen garasen. £uone£, akw, ara d u$alen
Win ixeddmen ayen ilhan u irna iumen, ur ipoueu laatab is. Ih, Nekwni Nepparu fellas
Ipwagdel asen a d u$alen $eo temdint i Nesqucc
alamma serreen d i Iaouo d Maouo. Nitni, si yal ti$ilt, a d azzlen
Tqeob ed lemaahda n tidep. Atan iqquo yieoi n wid ijehlen: "a tawa$it nne$! Ni$ nella ne$fel $ef waya. U, aaer, nella d imednas
Kunwi, s tidep, akked wayen taabden, war Oebbi, d is$aoen n Loahennama. £ures, kunwi, teppeddum
Lemmer llin widak d ioebbiten, ur p keccmen. Akw, ad wekkoen degs
I nitni, degs, zzhir. Nitni, degs, ur sellen
Ma d wid iwumi izwar ssaad, s$uone£, widak, segs, ad baaden
Ur sellen i uuut is. Ad wekkoen deg wayen cihwant teowiein nnsen
Ur ten i$webbel lweec abarar. A ten magrent lmalayek: "assa, d ass nnwen, i wen ippuwaaaden
Ass ideg ara Nesnefvas igenni am tweoqep n tira, akken Nebda axlaq amezwaru, ad as Nales. D lemaahda fellane£. Akka, ih, ara Nexdem
Ni$ Nura deg Ihellilen, deffir usmekti: "ara iweoten tamurt, d imdanen iW imaanen
Deg wayagi, war ccekk, d asali i ugdud iaabbaden
Ur k id Nuzen, siwa d aeunu i imavalen
Ini: "iyi d ippuweeean, siwa: Oebbi nnwen d Oebbi Yiwen kan. Kunwi ma d imvuaen
Ma wexxoen, ini: "aaggne$ awen, akken ma tellam; ur eoi$ ma iqoeb, ne$ ibaad, ayen i wen ippuwaaaden
Neppa, s tidep, Issen awal d iff$en, Issen ayen tessusmem
Ur eoi$ ma, ayagi, ahat d ahewwel nnwen, u d zzhu n tallit kan
Inna: "a Mass iw! Eekem s tidep. Mass nne$, Aenin, i nepper d Amaiwen, mgal ayen teppandim
A yimdanen! Eezzbet i Mass nnwen, zzenzla n yimir, stidep, d tadyant tabarart
Ass ideg ara p twalim, yal timoebbit a ppeppu win tessuiiuv, yal tadist a ppexseo. A pwaliv imdanen ssekoen, ur sskioen. Maca, aaaqeb n Oebbi iwaao
Ger yimdanen, illa win ipnamaren $ef Oebbi, war tamusni. Iteddu d yal cciian imcebbwel
Iura fellas: "ar wagi, win i t irran d bab is, ara t itlef, s tidep, u a t inheo ar uaaqeb ujajie

A yimdanen! Ma di ccekk ay tellam f tnekra, ihi, Nekwni, s tidep, Nxelq ikwen seg wakal, sinna, si tiqqit n l$ella, sinna, seg urgan, sinna, si tecriet, texleq ur texliq, iwakken ad awen Nbeggen. Neppara, di taabbuvin, ayen i £ ihwan, alamma d lajel ipwassnen. Sinna, Nessuffu$ ikwen id d llufanat, sinna a ppim$uoem. Segwen llan wid ippemmten, u segwen win ara iawven d awessur, ard ur ippisin acemma seg wayen issen. A pwalid akal d a$uoao. Ma Nesse$li d ageffur fellas, ad ikker, ad icuff, a d ifk tayuga n yal uuenf uziyn n le$ous
Ayagi, acku Oebbi d Tidep. D Neppa id Issidiren lmeggtin. Neppa Izmer i yal cci
U imir a d ias, war ccekk fellas. U Oebbi a d Issker wid illan di tneilin
Ger imdanen, illa win ipnamaren $ef Oebbi, war tamusni, ne$ nnhaya, ne$ Tazmamt ifeten
Icuff aqenduo, iwakken ad itlef seg ubrid n Oebbi. Fellas xezzu di ddunit. Deg wass n tnekra, a Nessuk fellas aaaqeb n tmeo$iwt
Ayagi, $ef wayen id urwen ifassen ik. U Oebbi ur Idennis imdanen
Ger yimdanen, win iaabden Oebbi, $ef rrif. Ma iusa t id lxio, ad ithenni yis. Ma iusa t id uhewwel, ad iswexxeo udem is. Oueent as, ddunit, laxeot. Ayagi d lexsaoa n uuee
Ipnuju, war Oebbi, ar wayen ur t neiiuoou, ur t neffaa. D wagi ay d ttelfan u$miq
Ipnuju ar bu vveoo izwaren aba$uo ines. Ay d bab ucmit, ay d acrik ucmit
Oebbi, s tidep, ad Issekcem wid iumnen, i ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar Loennet, ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen. Oebbi, s tidep, Ixeddem ayen Ib$a
Win i oaalen ur t Ipsellik ara Oebbi, di ddunit, di laxeot, ad iaalleq amrar s igenni, sinna, ad igzem nnefs is. Ad ieeo ma tieeeoci s temea ayen i t irean
Akka ay t id Nessader, d issekniyen iberrzen. U Oebbi, s tidep, Inehhu win i S ihwan
Ih, ass n tnekra, ad Ieudd Oebbi ger wid iumnen, udayen, iuabiyen, imasieiyen, u iaabbaden n tmes, wid ipcaraken. Oebbi, s tidep, Iwala yal cci

Ur twalav ara knan i Oebbi i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt: iiij, aggur, itran, idurar, ttjuo, leayawan, aias n yimdanen. Aaaqeb d lewoeb $ef aias. Win Isdull Oebbi, ur illi w ara t iauzzen. Ih, Oebbi Ixeddem ayen i S ihwan
Atnan sin ixuimen ppemqellaan $ef Mass nnsen. S tmes ay pwafeulen iceiiiven n wid ijehlen. Ad mmiren, $ef iqweooa nnsen, waman io$an
ara issefsin ayen illan deg iaabbav nnsen, akked igwelman
I nitni, ijekwaven n wuzzal
Yal tikelt ara ssirmen a d ff$en segs, seg wakken meenen, a ten rren $uoes: "jeoobet aaaqeb n tmeo$iwt
Oebbi, s tidep, ad Issekcem wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar Loennet, ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen. Degs ad qqnen imeqyasen n ddheb d lyaqut. Leerir deg iceiiiven nnsen
Pwanhan s awal umain, pwanhan s abrid Umaazuz
Ih, i wid ijehlen i issefoa$en abrid n Oebbi, akked Loamaa n Leaoam, i Nerra i imdanen, ama d amezda$ n din, ama d abeooani; i win ib$an degs tijehli, s ddens, a Nesaaddi aaaqeb aqeoean
Mi Nhegga i Iboahim, amkan n Uxxam: "ur iyI pcarak acemma! Zizdeg axxam iW i wid idewwioen, wid ibedden, wid iiiinizen, iknan
Enced medden ar leio. A d asen $uoek $ef uvao, ne$ $ef yal amerkub uliif. A d asen si yal abrid ibaaden
Ad cehhden $ef l$it nnsen. A d smektin ism n Oebbi, deg ussan ipwassnen, $ef ubhim n lmal i sen Ifka. Eccet segs, cceccet ame$bun, aeawali
Sinna, ad ssirden, ad qenaen asirem nnsen, ad dewwoen i Uxxam aqdim
Akka. Win ippauzzun ayen Igdel Oebbi, ilha yas kteo, ar Mass is. Eellen awen lmal, siwa wid i wen mlan. Janbet laao n taancuoin, janbet awal n eeuo
am wid imalen ar tidep ar Oebbi, ur aS pcaraken. Win ipcaraken i Oebbi, amzun i$li d seg igenni, u iccelqef it ufoux, ne$ inheo it wavu, s amekkan lqayen
Akka. Win ippauzzun isekkiren n Oebbi, ihi, d aeezzeb n wulawen
I kunwi degs aba$uo ar lajel ipwassnen, sinna, ieegga nnsen ar Uxxam aqdim
I yal lois, Nefka asekkir, iwakken a d smektin ism n Oebbi, $ef ubhim n lmal is iten N$at. Oebbi nnwen d Oebbi Yiwen. Ihi, anzet aS. Becceo itubiyen
wid iwumi ppergigin wulawen nnsen mara d mmektin Oebbi, wid iuebboen i wayen iten iu$en, wid ipeallan u pseddiqen seg wayen is iten N$at

Lmal iqebbwan, Nerra yawen ten, seg isekkiren n Oebbi. Degsen lfayda i kunwi. Bedret fellasen isem n Oebbi, mara d rsen. Mi $lin $ef ibeodiyen nnsen, eccet segsen, cceccet aaiiao, aeawali. Akka ay d Nenub fellawen yissen, amar a ppesnemmrem

Ur ippawev ar Oebbi uksum nnsen, ne$ idamen nnsen, d awez$i. Ara T iawven, d aeezzeb nnwen. Am akka, Inub fellawen yissen, iwakken ad aS tgem ccan i Oebbi, ilmend n nnhaya nnwen s$uoeS. Becceo wid imaanen
Ih, Oebbi Ipfukku wid iumnen. Ih, Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara yal lxayen ajehli
Tsrie i wid ipwawwven imi pwadensen - Oebbi, s tidep, Izmer a ten Isellek

wid id ssuff$en seg ixxamen nnsen, war ssebba, imi kan qqaoen: "Mass nne$ d Oebbi". Lemmer ur Iswexxio ara Oebbi imdanen, kra s kra, ara ipwahudden, war ccekk, d tiqwebtin, timezgida, lemuellat, lowamaa ideg d smektayen, aias, ism n Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Ippaawan win iT ippaawanen. Oebbi, s tidep, d Uohid, d Uzmir
Wid, ma Nessqaad iten di tmurt, bedden i teallit, pzekkin, ppamoen lewqama, gedlen tuccva. Ar Oebbi ara d gwrin lumuo
Ma skaddben k, ni$ skaddben, uqbel nnsen, igduden n Nue, Aad, akked Tamud
agdud n Iboahim, akked ugdud n Lui
At Madyan. Skaddben Musa. Fki$ lmudda i ijehliyen, sinna, Zzi$ d fellasen. A tuzzma W imiren
Aceal n temdinin ay Nesqucc imi densent. Haatent ppint. Xlan lebyar, akked lebruo uohiden
Day ur unagen ara di tmurt? Ad saun, $ef waya, ulawen ad fehmen yissen, imeeeu$en ara islen yissen. Maca, macci d allen, d ulawen deg idmaren i idre$len
B$an k a d tesqeobev aaaqeb. Oebbi ur Ipzeggil lemaahda S, d awez$i. Ni$ ass, ar Mass ik, am agim iseggwasen, s leesab nnwen
Aceal n temdinin iwumi Fki$ lmudda, u irna densent. Sinna, Zzi$ fellasent. £uoI tu$alin
Ini: "a yimdanen! Nek, $uowen, d aneddao kan ipbegginen
I wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ssmae akked ooeeq ukyis
Wid iaanan asfunneg issekniyen nne£, widak d at ujajie
Ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, amazan ne$ nnbi, mebla ma ikecm ed Cciian, deg wayen imenna, ma imenna. Itekkes Oebbi ayen d issekcam Cciian, sinna, Itebbit issekniyen iS. Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Bab n uuwab
Iwakken ad Irr aggway n Cciian d ahewwel, i at wulawen iblan akked at wulawen aquoan. Ih, imednas atnan di t$ennant tu$miqt
Iwakken ad eoen wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni, ar neppa d tidep, s$uo Mass ik. Ad amnen yis. Ad as anzen wulawen nnsen. Oebbi, s tidep, Inehhu wid iumnen, s abrid uwqim
Zgan wid ijehlen di ccekk fellas, ar ten id ias yimir, deqzalla, ne$ ibbwev iten id uaaqeb n wass abarar
Assen, tagelda i Oebbi. Ad Ieudd garasen. Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ad ilin di Loennet n ssuaada
I wid ijehlen, iskaddben issekniyen nne£, aaaqeb isdullun
Wid iunagen, deg ubrid n Oebbi, sinna, pwan$an ne$ mmuten, a ten I$it Oebbi, war ccekk, s ooeeq umain. Ih, Oebbi Yif akw im$iten
A ten Issekcem anekcum ara oadin. Ih, Oebbi d Amusnaw, Ieellem
Akka. Win iaaqben akken ippuaaqeb, sinna, ipwadnes, war ccekk, a t Isellek Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Ipqili, Ipsemmie
Akka, acku Oebbi Issekcam iv deg wass, Issekcam ass deg yiv. U Oebbi Issel, Ipwali
Akka, acku Oebbi d tidep, ma d ayen u$uo pnujun, war Neppa, d tikerkas. Ih, Oebbi d Aalayan, d Ameqwoan
Day ur twalav ara Oebbi Isse$li d aman, seg igenni, d$a izzegzew wakal? Ih, Oebbi d Laiif, Ieoa
IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Ih, Oebbi, ar Neppa d Asaay d Amaazuz

Ur twalav ara Oebbi Inub ed fellawen s wayen illan di tmurt, akked lbabur ippazalen di yill, s lameo iS. Iiief igenni ur d i$elli f tmurt, siwa ma Iunef as. Ih, Oebbi, war ccekk, Issuruf u Ipeunu i imdanen
D Neppa ikwen Issadren, sinna, ara kwen In$en, sinna, ara kwen id Issadren. Amdan, s tidep, d ajehli
I yal lois, Nefka asekkir, teddun degs. Ulay$eo i k pna$en $ef lameo. Nuj ar Mass ik; ih, aql ak, kecc, di nnhaya tuwqimt
Ma numren k, ini: "Oebbi Yif akw akken Issen ayen txeddmem
Oebbi ad Ieudd garawen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen tellam temgarradem
Day ur teeoiv ara Oebbi Issen i illan deg igenni akked tmurt? Ayagi, s tidep, di Tezmamt. Ih, ayagi ishel i Oebbi
La aabden, war Oebbi, ayen iwumi ur d Issers adabu, ayen ur ssinen. Imednas, ur illi wa ara ten isellken

Ma mlan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, a paaqlev asmmummi deg udmawen n wid ijehlen. Qoib ad eevmen $ef wid i sen iqqaoen issekniyen nne£. Ini: "a kwen xebboe$ af wayen i$elben aya: times i Iaahed Oebbi i wid ijehlen". A tu$alin tucmip

A yimdanen! Ippunefk ed umedya, selt as d: ih, wid u$uo tepnujum, war Oebbi, ur zmiren, d awez$i, a d xelqen izi, xas mlalen $ef waya. Ma illa wayen i sen iuker yizi, ur zmiren ad as t id kksen. D uohif umsuter, d uohif win issuter
Ur qudoen ara Oebbi, azal n lqedo iS. Ih, Oebbi d Uohid, d Uzmir
Oebbi Iferren imazanen ger lmalayek, u ger imdanen. Ih, Oebbi Issel, Ipwali
Issen i illan zdat sen, i illan deffir sen. Ar Oebbi ad u$alen lumuo
A wid iumnen! Iiinzet u knut, aabdet Mass nnwen, xedmet lxio, amar a prebeem

Jahdet ar Oebbi leeqq ujahed iS. Neppa Ifren ikwen. Ur kwen Ihejjen ara di ddin, ddin ubabat wen Iboahim. Neppa, i wen isemman, zik, imvuaen. Deg waya, ad yili Umazan d anagi nnwen, u a ppilim d inagan n medden. Ihi, eeallet, zekkit, teiifem di Oebbi. Neppa d Bab nnwen. D Bab amxallef, d Asellak amxallef
